# Chapter 1: Introduction

This is the first chapter of the documentation.

## 1.1 What is Bookdown?

Bookdown is an R package that makes it easy to write books and long-form documents with R Markdown.

## 1.2 Why Use Bookdown?

Bookdown enables dynamic, reproducible, and interactive documents for web publication.
